tuv.seg: Irish Museum of Modern Art
Áras Nua-Ealaíne na hÉireann
The Irish Museum of Modern Art (IMMA), which was established in May 1991, is the country's leading national institution for the collection and exhibition of contemporary art
Is príomhinstitiúid náisiúnta na tíre í Áras Nua-Ealaíne na hÉireann (IMMA), a bunaíodh i mBealtaine 1991, chun ealaín chomhaimseartha a bhailiú agus a thaispeáint
The collection of artworks owned by or on long-term loan to the Museum consists of works by Irish and non-Irish artists
Is éard atá sa bhailiúchán de shaothair ealaíne, atá faoi úinéireacht nó ar iasacht fhadtéarmach leis an Áras, saothair de chuid ealaíontóirí Éireannacha agus neamh-Éireannacha araon
The collection has been developed by purchase, loans and donations, as well as by the commissioning of new works
Rinne ceannach, iasachtaí agus tabhartais an bailiúchán a fhorbairt, mar aon le saothair nua a choimisiúnú
The Museum, which is housed in the Royal Hospital in Kilmainham (Dublin), presents retrospectives, solo exhibitions, group exhibitions and projects
Cuireann an tÁras, atá lonnaithe san Ospidéal Ríoga i gCill Mhaighneann (Baile Átha Cliath), taispeántais shiarghabhálacha, taispeántais aonair, grúpthaispeántais agus tionscadail i láthair
It also shows its collection in rotating temporary displays, as well as exhibitions and projects organised by the Museum's Engagement and Learning Department
Ina theannta sin, taispeántar an bailiúchán i dtaispeáintí sealadacha rothlacha, mar aon le taispeátnais agus tionscadail a eagraíonn Rannóg Rannpháirtíocht agus Foghlama an Árais
The Artists' Residency Programme is the Museum's studio/residency programme, which provides opportunities for artists to research and develop their artistic practice
Is é Clár Cónaitheachta na nEalaíontóirí clár stiúideo/cónaitheachta an Árais, a chuireann deiseanna ar fáil d’ealaíontóirí le taighde agus forbairt a dhéanamh ar a gcleachtas ealaíonta
This programme is open to artists of all nationalities working in any medium - artists either apply to the Museum or are invited to take part in the programme by the Museum

Tá an clár seo oscailte d’ealaíontóirí den uile náisiúntacht a oibríonn i meán ar bith – cuireann ealaíontóirí iarratas isteach chuig an Áras nó tugann an tÁras cuireadh dóibh páirt a ghlacadh sa chlár
Engagement and Learning Programme
Clár Rannpháirtíocht agus Foghlama
The Museum has developed a number of programmes and projects intended to address the needs of specific groups, such as schools and colleges
Rinne an tÁras líon clár agus tionscadal a fhorbairt atá beartaithe le dul i ngleic le riachtanais ghrúpaí ar leith, ar nós scoileanna agus coláistí
It provides a range of options, including guided tours, workshops, talks, discussions and studio visits, all of which can be tailored to meet the needs of a particular group

Cuireann sé réimse roghanna ar fáil, lena n-áirítear turais threoraithe, ceardlanna, cainteanna, plé agus turais ar an stiúideo, agus is féidir iad seo uile a chur in oiriúint do riachtanais ghrúpa ar leith
The National Programme is a programme that distributes the assets, resources and skills of the museum to a variety of situations and locations in Ireland, both north and south
Is éard atá sa Chlár Náisiúnta clár a dhéanann sócmhainní, acmhainní agus scileanna an Árais a dháileadh ar roinnt cásanna agus suíomhanna in Éirinn, ó thuaidh agus ó theas araon

Using the museum's collection and exhibitions generated by the museum, the National Programme facilitates the creation of exhibitions and other projects for display in a range of locations around Ireland

Agus leas á bhaint as bailiúcháin agus as taispeántais an Árais arna gcruthú ag an Áras, éascaíonn an Clár Náisiúnta cruthú taispeántas agus tionscadal eile lena dtaispeáint i réimse suíomhanna ar fud na hÉireann
The exhibitions are formed and organised in partnership with local venues and groups
Cruthaítear agus eagraítear na taispeántais i gcomhpháirtíocht le hionaid agus le grúpaí áitiúla
The museum is open from 11.30am to 5.30pm, Tuesday to Friday, Saturday from 10.00am to 5.30pm and from 12.00pm to 5.30 pm on Sunday and Bank Holidays
Tá an tÁras ar oscailt idir 11.30r.n. agus 5.30i.n., ón Máirt go dtí an Aoine, ar an Satharn idir 10.00r.n. agus 5.30i.n. agus idir 12.00i.n. agus 5.30i.n. ar an Domhnach agus ar Shaoirí Poiblí
Closed on Mondays, 24 - 27 December
Tá sé dúnta ar an Luan agus idir an 24 agus an 27 Nollaig
Guided Tours of Exhibitions
Turais Threoraithe na dTaispeántas
Free guided tours of exhibitions are available on Wednesday at 1.15pm, Friday and Sunday at 2.30pm
Tá fáil ar thurais threoraithe na dtaispeántas saor in aisce ar an gCéadaoin ag 1.15i.n, ar an Satharn agus ar an Domhnach ag 2.30i.n
No booking is required
Ní gá rud ar bith a chur in áirithe
It is possible to pre-book a guided tour
Is féidir turas treoraithe a chur in áirithe roimh ré
Tours must be booked at least three weeks in advance
Ní mór turais a chur in áirithe ar a laghad trí seachtaine roimh ré
More information on tours here
Tá tuilleadh faisnéise faoi thurais anseo
You can pre-book a guided tour
Is féidir leat turas treoraithe a chur in áirithe roimh ré
It must be booked at least three weeks in advance of your intended visit
Ní mór turais a chur in áirithe ar a laghad trí seachtaine sula mbíonn sé beartaithe agat cuairt a thabhairt ar an Áras
You can book a tour online on the Museum's website
Is féidir leat turas a chur in áirithe ar líne ar láithreán gréasáin an Árais
